AiiDA VASP Plugin Introduction
==============================

The AiiDA VASP Plugin aims to provide a full support for running `VASP`_ calculations using the `AiiDA` package.
We rely heavily on the VASP support already provided by the `matproj`_ through the `pymatgen`_ package.

.. _pymatgen: http://pymatgen.org/
.. _matproj: 'Materials Project' http://www.materialsproject.org/
.. _vasp: http://www.vasp.at/
